button.title: Button
button.description: The text to show on the buy button(s).

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Sets the theme of the button. By default this is set to green we offer a handful of other themes too. You can set this value to none to not use any styling so you can apply your own using CSS.

stylesheet.title: Stylesheet
stylesheet.description: Custom CSS you want to apply to your button.

items.title: Product
items.description: Please fill out the product details from your paddle account.

element.title: Element
element.description: The element where the button will be rendered inside of.

product.title: Product
product.description: Pass your Product ID from the Paddle Dashboard via this parameter.

passthough.title: Passthough
passthough.description: This value will be passed back to your server if you're using a 'webhook' fulfillment type, or subscriptions.

success.title: Success
success.description: By default the checkout will show the standard Paddle success page. Setting this will instead redirect the customer to your URL instead of showing the standard Paddle message.

allowQuantity.title: Allow Quantity
allowQuantity.description: Should we show the quantity selector on the checkout page?

coupon.title: Coupon
coupon.description: Use this field to automatically apply a coupon to the checkout.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Change the quantity of the product selected on the checkout page.

price.title: Price
price.description: This field allows you to dynamically override the price charged at checkout.

auth.title: Auth
auth.description: Use this to sign your price field and dynamically override the products price.

override.title: Override
override.description: Advanced option. Allows the checkout page used to be overridden. This is for developers using our API to dynamically create checkout links.
